data.lyric:
[ti:Viral Moment (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:Viral Moment (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Viral Moment (Explicit) - Lil Durk
[00:03.50]Lyrics by：Durk Banks/Trenton Turner/Cameron Hubler
[00:07.01]Composed by：Durk Banks/Trenton Turner/Cameron Hubler
[00:10.51]Touch a trend be wildin' with it
[00:12.50]I pour up Hennes' out the Lamb' truck fell asleep slime
[00:15.26]I thought them n***as had my back but I'm steady seein' signs
[00:18.52]And I can't turn my back on like I ain't see him tryin'
[00:21.33]These tears shed whenever he dead it's different from seein' him die
[00:24.47]Bah get close up on 'em you know that s**t be graphic
[00:27.56]You gotta pop out with that ratchet you know this s**t get tragic
[00:30.38]And you can't fumble with that stick you know this s**t ain't Madden
[00:33.60]All that s**t you did in the streets you know that s**t gon' vanish
[00:36.42]Yeah I pop these pills they try to read my thoughts
[00:39.49]And you can't dig back in your past because you got time you lost
[00:42.41]And make that time up for your kids 'cause you know time ain't bought
[00:45.58]Booka bought me a diamond cross but he know he won't cross me
[00:48.36]They turnt their back and said they'd kill me yeah that's when they lost
[00:51.56]I put Bugatti inside the Cartier because I'm feelin' boss
[00:54.44]They feel some type of way in the county jail I told them "Call me"
[00:57.32]I built a relationship with the real with n***as who never saw me
[01:00.44]Yeah I seen my chance and that's when I grabbed it
[01:03.36]F**k bein' a hunnid I spent a couple hunnids on n***as tablets
[01:06.39]Lean gave me chest pains that's when I popped the Perky tablets
[01:09.25]I tried to get that family vibe for n***as who wasn't established
[01:12.33]You do that s**t again what you did so bro gon' get you a casket
[01:15.86]I did s**t for n***as without them askin'
[01:18.94]I broke pounds for n***as without the matches
[01:21.79]I don't f**k with you I'ma tell you now even though I got it
[01:24.33]Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
[01:36.30]This s**t was different we was together like ten years ago
[01:39.47]And I don't talk to a lotta n***as but they still the bros
[01:42.31]The one that I ain't talk to back then know they still h*es
[01:45.41]And some n***as try to hide their hate but that still shows
[01:48.40]I never f**ked on block h*es because I call 'em sisters
[01:51.51]One hate me right now as I speak because I called her a hooker
[01:54.45]Cut the loose ends I cut 'em off they try to stay I'm a butcher
[01:57.31]B***h you a rat never mind I changed my life I'm Muslim
[02:00.52]I talked to Chops on FaceTime he said "D**n you back smokin'"
[02:03.37]He said "That back door d**n near closed" I said "It's back open"
[02:06.48]I say "These blocks could be back one" he said "You back hopin'"
[02:09.41]You gotta watch the n***as you love 'cause they still backdoorin'
[02:12.43]He ain't got no hope in beatin' his trial because he lost his motion
[02:15.30]Bro got life he don't know how p***y smell that's why he f**k his lotion
[02:18.31]I know some real n***as would lose it all for a viral moment
[02:21.28]My dreads swing I feel like Wayne show me my opponent
[02:25.59]And I like talkin' to the streets like
[02:28.40]When you say you the voice you gotta like open up like
[02:30.70]Tell motherf**kers what it is like you can't hold nothin' back
[02:33.24]You gotta relate to them relate to the poverty you know what I'm sayin'
[02:37.14]Relate to the trenches
[02:37.84]Yeah yeah
[02:39.23]You know I can't be talkin' 'bout a Richard Mille all the time
[02:41.39]Yeah yeah yeah
[02:41.77]Know what I'm sayin'
[02:42.50]Yeah
[02:42.64]Some of the guys don't even know what the f**k a Richard Mille is
[02:44.94]Know what I'm sayin' you gotta relate all angles know what I'm sayin'
[02:48.44]The voice
[02:49.47]Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Viral Moment (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:Viral Moment (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.50]//
[00:07.00]//
[00:10.51]TouchofTrent制作
[00:12.50]我在兰博基尼里喝着轩尼诗 渐渐睡着了
[00:15.26]我以为那些人是支持我的 但我看到了不祥征兆
[00:18.52]我不能放松警惕 我看不到他为我做出的努力
[00:21.33]眼泪不停流 不管他何时死去 眼睁睁看着他死总是感觉怪怪的
[00:24.47]对他们锁上心门 你知道 这一切已经明明白白
[00:27.56]你得随时警惕 保护好自己 你知道这种事情多悲哀
[00:30.38]你不懂怎么使用枪支 你知道那东西不是闹着玩的
[00:33.60]你在街头做的那些事情 你知道 总有一天会消失殆尽
[00:36.42]我吃着那种东西 他们想要读取我的思想
[00:39.49]你没有办法回到过去 因为那些时光你已经失去了
[00:42.41]腾出时间陪陪你的孩子吧 因为你知道 时间是金钱买不来的
[00:45.58]Booka给我买了一个钻石十字架 但他知道他不会背叛我
[00:48.36]他们转身离去 说他们会杀了我 那时候他们就已经迷失了
[00:51.56]我开布加迪 我戴卡地亚 因为我觉得自己是老大
[00:54.44]他们在县监狱里感觉有点不开心 我告诉他们 给我打电话
[00:57.32]我和那些从没见过我的耿直人建立了深厚的情谊
[01:00.44]我看到了机遇 所以我紧抓着不放
[01:03.36]什么做个实在人 去他的吧 我花了好多钱买那种东西
[01:06.39]特制饮料让我胸口疼 那时候我就换了一种东西试一试
[01:09.25]我想给那些还没有成名的兄弟一点家的温暖
[01:12.33]你要是再做以前的那些破事儿 我会给你准备一口棺材
[01:15.86]我为兄弟们做了很多事 不需要他们开口求我
[01:18.94]我愿意为兄弟们花钱 不需要他们太多回报
[01:21.79]我不会搭理你 我告诉你 虽然我早就知道了
[01:24.33]//
[01:36.30]一切都不一样了 我们十年前还在一起
[01:39.47]很多人我没有再联系 但他们还是我的好兄弟
[01:42.31]当时我没怎么交流的人 我知道他们依然是那个样子
[01:45.41]有些人想要掩饰心中的仇恨 但还是表现出来了
[01:48.40]我从来不会伤害街头的女人 因为我把她们称作姐妹
[01:51.51]现在我一说话 就会招来某个人的恨 因为我说她是站街女
[01:54.45]剪断那些联系 我和他们断绝关系 他们还是不想走 我是个无情的屠夫
[01:57.31]碧池 你是个内鬼 无所谓 我改变了我的人生 我是个穆斯林
[02:00.52]我和Chops视频通话 他说 天哪 你又在抽烟了
[02:03.37]他说 机会差一点就溜走了 我说 还好我抓住了
[02:06.48]我说 这街头风气或许可以恢复如常吧 他说 你又开始期待了
[02:09.41]你得小心你在意的那些人 因为他们一样可能背叛你
[02:12.43]他没有希望打赢官司 因为他得不到支持
[02:15.30]兄弟被判终身监禁 没有办法和女人缠绵 所以他只能自己解决
[02:18.31]我知道有些实在人也会为了那转瞬即逝的名声放弃一切
[02:21.28]我的发辫摇摇晃晃 我感觉自己是Lil Wayne 让我看看我的对手在哪里
[02:25.59]我喜欢和街头的人交流
[02:28.40]当你要表达自己的时候 你就得敞开心扉
[02:30.70]告诉那些混蛋这是什么情况 你是无法阻挡这一切的
[02:33.24]你得和他们产生共鸣 谈谈贫穷 你知道我什么意思吗
[02:37.14]谈谈贫民窟的事情
[02:37.84]//
[02:39.23]你知道我不能总是谈论理查德·米勒这样的东西
[02:41.39]//
[02:41.77]懂我的意思吗
[02:42.50]//
[02:42.64]有些人甚至不知道理查德·米勒是什么东西
[02:44.94]懂我的意思吗 你得和别人产生共鸣 全方位的了解 懂我的意思吧
[02:48.44]勇敢表达
[02:49.47]//
